title: cmd/gc: cannot assign <T> to x (type int) in multiple assignment
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. http://play.golang.org/p/O3J9114uMH
2.
3.

What is the expected output?
prog.go:8: undefined: notAType

What do you see instead?
prog.go:5: cannot assign <T> to x (type int) in multiple assignment
prog.go:5: cannot assign <T> to y (type int) in multiple assignment
prog.go:8: undefined: notAType

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version devel +47b2b07a837f Fri Oct 11 16:39:40 2013 -0700 linux/amd64

Please provide any additional information below.
